hooks.command: if [ -n "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS" ] && [ -f ~/.claude/ide/*.lock ]; then PORT=$(cat ~/.claude/ide/*.lock 2>/dev/null | jq -r '.port // ""'); AUTH=$(cat ~/.claude/ide/*.lock 2>/dev/null | jq -r '.authToken // ""'); if [ -n "$PORT" ] && [ -n "$AUTH" ]; then curl -s -X POST -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -H "x-claude-code-ide-authorization: $AUTH" -d '{"jsonrpc":"2.0","method":"tools/call","params":{"name":"reloadBuffers","arguments":{"file_paths":["'$CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS'"]}},"id":1}' "http://localhost:$PORT/" >/dev/null 2>&1; fi; fi
